alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 15 at 6:54AM EDT until July 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHWESTERN SAMPSON COUNTIES... At 654 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated the heavy rain has ended, with light to moderate rain continuing. Up to 4 inches of rain fell between Eastover and Dunn, including along Interstate 95. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Godwin, Eastover, Wade, Falcon, Linden and Spivey`s Corner. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
